overview: Her crotch...her crotch...her crotch is on fire! That's right, bitches! Fire crotch or not, we're serving you a platter of the hottest redhead babes in the biz, Scarlett Fay, Faye Valentine, Marie McCray, Jayme Langford, Dani Jensen, Kiki Vidis, Katja Kassin, and Riley Shy lead this red hot cast for over 4 hours and 50 minutes of flamin' hot action. With 2 discs full of solo, anal, and good old-fashioned fucking, it's no wonder why everybody loves those damn redheads!
title: I Love Redheads
